spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent with the plan. Minor misalignment in the kitchen area wall thickness and the positioning of the small recessed corridor on the right side.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are accounted for precisely. Door swings and window placements match the blueprint. Wall transitions are generally clean, though the small balcony thresholds show slight geometric merging.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture types and locations. Minor scale variation in the dining table versus the sofa proportions in the living room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic representation. Lighting is soft and clear. Geometry is clean with no significant rendering artifacts, though some textures are simplified.

detected_errors.description: Minor shift in the placement of the right-side balcony entrance door relative to the bedroom wall.
Kitchen island and cabinetry appear slightly elongated compared to the width shown in the 2D plan.
Slight shadow artifacting in the small bathrooms at the top of the plan where walls meet the floor.
